segments.text: I really like the way this house looks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it has great curb appeal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is nice , but wait until you see the interior .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see what you mean !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The carpeting and paint are all new , as well as the window treatments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love the sage green carpeting with the sunset-colored walls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , look at that beautiful countertop material and the double sink !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let â€™ s go check out the bedroom and bathroom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really like the Jacuzzi bathtub in the bathroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am happy that you like the house . We should write down what we like so that we can remember it .
